channel.title: Why isn't this working?

item.title: Why isn't this working?
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

is so you can be lazy.
[php]

<? session_start(); if(!session_is_registered(myusername)){ echo "You must be logged in to view this page."; } else { echo '

'; } ?>

[/php]

Read full topic

item.title: Why isn't this working?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

You have to put echo ‘anus nigra</html…>’;

Read full topic

item.title: Why isn't this working?
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

You have to either close your PHP tag before the else statement, and start it up again after the HTML, or echo the HTML statement.

You can’t just use plain HTML in PHP

Read full topic

item.title: Why isn't this working?
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.description:
@I_james_I wrote:

Hello,

I want this to work so that when you are logged in, it shows this html code, here is how ive done it:

[code]<?
session_start();
if(!session_is_registered(myusername)){
echo “You must be logged in to view this page.”;
}
else {

		<div style="text-align: center; margin-left: auto; visibility:visible; margin-right: auto; width:450px;"><embed style="width:435pxvisibility:visible; height:270px;" allowScriptAccess="never" src="http://www.musicplaylist.us/mc/mp3player-othersite.swf?config=http://www.musicplaylist.us/mc/config/config_red_noautostart_shuffle.xml&mywidth=435&myheight=270&playlist_url=http://www.musicplaylist.us/loadplaylist.php?playlist=55851911" menu="false" quality="high" width="435" height="270" name="mp3player" wmode="transparent" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" pluginspage="http://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer" border="0"/><BR><a href=http://www.musicplaylist.us>

}
?>[/code]

I get this error:

Parse error: syntax error, unexpected '<' in /home/sphinx/public_html/music/content/embed/random_1.php on line 7

Does anyone no why?

Thanks

Read full topic
